name: Worcle
description:
An addictive game with a simple premise - shoot balls into the circle to make words. Create words of three or more letters to clear the balls but watch out for the swirling vortex! Don't let the circle fill up or you'll get sucked in and it's game over.

Clear the circle completely for bonus points or create cascades of words for high scoring multipliers.

Play in Strategy Mode and take your time setting up high scoring combos. Or put your quick thinking to the test and see how long you can survive in Timed Mode, where you only have a few seconds to play each letter!

Compete in Game Center leaderboards and earn achievements for making awesome words and conquering the hardest levels.

Features:
- Universal app for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch
- Stunning retina graphics
- A great workout for your mind
- Check definitions of the words you made
- Game Center leaderboards and achievements
- Saves your progress to continue the game later
- Hours of fun
